search_genes¶

search_genes API reference¶

txsscanlib.search_genes.search_genes(genes, cfg)[source]¶

For each each gene of the list use the profile to perform an HMM and parse the output to generate a HMMReport and save it in a file. These tasks are performed in parrallel using threads. The number of workers can be limited by worker_nb directive in the config object.

Parameters:
  • genes (list of txsscanlib.gene.Gene objects) – the genes to search in the genome
  • cfg (txsscanlib.config.Config object) – the configuration

HMM Report
